caption: elastic.co
description: Get up and get going with SSL/TLS + Native authentication using Shield for Elasticsearch.
message: When planning to stand up a new #Elasticsearch cluster, it is important to make considerations for implementing authentication and SSL/TLS with Shield as early as possible. Check out this new tutorial on how to get started... http://go.es.io/2aeEOAM
name: Getting Started with Elasticsearch and SSL & Native Authentication
